name: m365-copilot-skills
description: A curated collection of reusable skills for working with Microsoft 365 services and APIs. These skills enhance AI coding agents with domain-specific knowledge for M365 development.
author: Sebastien Levert

plugins.name: m365-agent-scaffolder
plugins.description: Quickly scaffolds new Microsoft 365 Copilot declarative agent projects using ATK CLI. Use when creating a new empty M365 Copilot agent project from scratch.
plugins.author: Sebastien Levert

plugins.name: m365-agent-developer
plugins.description: Designs, implements, and deploys Microsoft 365 Copilot agents using TypeSpec and ATK CLI. Provides architectural guidance, capability configuration, security patterns, and lifecycle management.
plugins.author: Sebastien Levert
